title: 3D Tutorial: Visualization of 3D data in Fiji using built-in tools and the plugin 3Dscript
description: This tutorial shows different approaches to visualize 3D microscopy data in Fiji. It provides a quick introduction to some of the tools bundled in Fiji, such as Orthogonal Views, Volume Viewer, 3D Viewer, and BigDataViewer, and a more in-depth explanation of the plugin 3Dscript.
